column4: ok, still looking for a good scientific/graphing calculator, i found "Qualculate!" which is a great scientific calculator but lacks the graphing capabilities. If anyone has a tip of one that combines the two like say a Texas Instrument 85 calculator, pls shout it out
i mean ok, it uses gnuplot to, but still
File > Plot Function/Data, enter an expression, and click "Add". at least on the KDE version.
